title: FS: 21 T206 VG Or Slightly Worse 9/5 Through 9/7 Take 15% Off
author: btcarfagno

posts.post_title: FS: 21 T206 VG Or Slightly Worse 9/5 Through 9/7 Take 15% Off
posts.post_content:
FRIDAY SEPTEMBER 5 THROUGH SUNDAY SEPTEMBER 7 TAKE 15% OFF MY PRICES LISTED FOR ANY T206 CARD

All cards are complete (no clipped corner) and are VG or worse condition. Scanner doesn't pick up creases well so I will try to describe issues that scanner might miss.

Camnitz Throw Arm Down...1/2 inch crease from top middle to ear. $34

Chase Trophy...Smudging and left to right crease across card through lips. $50

Conroy Fielding...Very light 1/4 inch crease (front only). SOLD

Conroy Batting...No creases. SOLD

Criss...Print scratch but no creases. Also slight freak....too much red. $38

Devore...SOLD

Doyle Portrait...Some wrinkling at lower right. SOLD

Gilbert...SOLD

Jordan Batting...Light wrinkle across card at eye level full length of card. Some soil spots. SOLD

Karger...No creases. SOLD

Konetchy Glove High...Crease in lower right corner. Also too much red. Lipstick? $34

Lake NY Follow Through...Nice clean card but chipping at bottom border. $32

Pfeister Throw...No creases. SOLD

Rhoades Right Arm Extended...Creasing upper left otherwise very clean. $34

Spencer...Wrinkling top middle of top border to top right corner. $34

Steinfeldt...SOLD

Sullivan...1/4 inch crease from bottom border to bottom shirt button, crease from middle top border to top of head. SOLD

Tannehill...No creases. $34

Tenney...Beautiful card. No creases. Erased writing on back. SOLD

White...SOLD

Wiltse...Some scuffing and light surface crease (front only) from right border to middle of cap.
